spatial_accuracy.notes: The fundamental layout is severely distorted. The garage orientation is rotated 90 degrees compared to the plan, and Bedroom #2/Utility areas have been rearranged. Door placements are often merged into text blobs rather than clean architectural openings.

structural_fidelity.notes: Major violation: The model is covered in text labels, measurement lines, and UI-style artifacts. A second garage/carport structure has been hallucinated on the right side which does not exist in the 2D plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen island and master bath fixtures are present but distorted. Most rooms lack the 'block-style' furniture requested and instead show flat symbols or empty space.

aesthetic_quality.notes: While it uses a neutral background and isometric camera, the render fails the 'no textures' rule by including grass/pavement textures and uses realistic car models/lighting instead of flat shading.

detected_errors.description: Heavy presence of text labels and measurement lines directly on the 3D model surface.
Hallucinated exterior carport/garage section and car model not present in architectural plan.
Garage and Bedroom #2 placement/orientation significantly deviated from the original plan.
Presence of realistic textures (grass, stone) and non-simplified geometry for vehicles.
